docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Datadash is a light Python package for quickly inspecting data. The core idea is to make it easy to point to different data sources and pull them into an environment where they can easily be queried.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Datadash is available through PyPi.

pip install datadash

docs.title: Usage
docs.text:
The basic usage of Datadash is to call it as a module.

python3 -m datadash

The above command will open up the graphical user interface (GUI).
